description: Id of the product - Scope: both
name: product_id

description: Name of the product - Scope: both
name: product_name

description: Brand of the product - Scope: both
name: brand_name

description: Category of the product - Scope: both
name: category

description: Total number of product items purchased - Scope: global
name: product_total_purchased_items

description: Total amount of money spent - Scope: global
name: product_total_spend

description: Last date the product was purchased - Scope: global
name: last_product_purchase_date

description: Day used for data aggregation in columns with 'time-dependent' scope. This column must be used for all queries that involves a time range - Scope: time-dependent
name: session_day

description: Total number of items purchased for this product during one day - Scope: time-dependent
name: daily_product_purchased_items

description: Money spent on this product during one day - Scope: time-dependent
name: daily_product_spend

description: Country where the product was bought - Scope: both
name: country

description: Event (email, etc.) that triggered the visit of the user on the website - Scope: both
name: traffic_source
